'''0.1.4''' is a server version of [[Java Edition Alpha]] released with client version [[Alpha v1.0.17|v1.0.17]] on August 20, 2010, which fixes bugs.<ref name="blogpost">[[wordofnotch:982299297|"Seecret Friday 8! OooooOOOoo!"]] – [[The Word of Notch]], August 20, 2010</ref>

== Fixes ==
'''2 bugs fixed'''
* Fixed problems with [[door]]s.
* Fixed [[torch]]es attaching to the wrong walls.
